welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haverford, the charming city known for its historic landmarks and picturesque landscapes. We are delighted to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay in Haverford!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and comfortable waiting areas.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, the private aviation terminal at Wings Field Airport provides luxurious and exclusive services, such as private lounges and concierge assistance.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights to major cities in the United States.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to select destinations around the world.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Doylestown Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi service is available throughout the airport.
